column5: That 4 yr old stayed alittle to long in that border bar.
I think my wife has deuced in at least half of those pulp checks. We no longer eat before travelling 502. That doesn't always prevent an e-stop but it's cut them way down.
We usually make a stop at one of these pull offs as well. Has anyone ever been scolded by a cop, trucker, or construction people for using them as a restroom?
Anone recently drive 502 and if so, what is the condition?
Was just up and down it last week. Few rough/bumpy spots but overall good.
Returned on it yesterday. Thought it was good.
We were up in June. The 502 is the best it's been for years.
I agree with BCNeal.Just returned last Wednesday.Highway 502 is in the best shape in years!

Was on it a few weeks ago and didn't have any problems. Our flight from Minneapolis to Winnipeg got canceled, so I drove from Minneapolis to Red Lake, trying to get there by dark. I greatly exceeded the speed limit and made some risky passes. Luckily we dodged the OPP and made it to Red Lake in time.
Drove thru week of 6/24 - 7/1 502 was good overall until your 4 year old son decides to puke half way throughâ€¦ makes for good memories though am i right?? Safe travels everyone
That's what pulp check stations are for after a long night at the Border Bar Seen a few of those stops. PjShorthorn
